text: Bodiggo is a hamlet in Cornwall, England, United Kingdom. It is situated half- a-mile north of Luxulyan (where the 2011 Census population is included), five miles (8 km) north-east of St Austell.Ordnance Survey: Landranger map sheet 200 Newquay & Bodmin Bodiggo was described in the Domesday Book.Open Domesday Online: Bodiggo ==References== ==External links== Category:Hamlets in Cornwall
title: Bodiggo
